softwareEngineer.title: Software Engineer
softwareEngineer.description: Frontender at TUI Musement since November 2022, I work mainly with Nuxt2 and Vue2, but I also work with Node.js and Express Gateway, where I have the opportunity to see some hints of BackEnd. My current studies are aimed at Nuxt3/Vue3, and in my free time, I study Angular.
softwareEngineer.TO_DO-description: Front-end Developer Computer enthusiast since childhood. I have various experience in the tech field, such as photo editing and sound design. I currently work as a Software Engineer at TUI Musement with Nuxt and Vue Frameworks

runner.title: Runner
runner.description: Runner since I was a child, specialized in sprint and middle distance, today I run for the A.S.D. Team Atletica Palermo, my distances are 1500m and 800m on track but I also ran the half-marathon in 1h30m.

musician.title: Musician
musician.description: Since I was 8 years old, I started playing the piano, then the guitar, bass, and drums. During my adolescence, I had the opportunity to experiment with recording some songs with Cubase. Today, I write music that I publish on the most famous streaming services, such as Spotify, Apple Music, and Youtube.
